title: Leo Flowers, Live from San Diego (ACS November 1)
itunes:title: Leo Flowers, Live from San Diego (ACS November 1)
description: Adam takes the stage for a second night at Mic Drop Comedy in San Diego. He chats about a bike ride he took earlier in the day before complaining about a sign he saw at a cofeehouse. Comedian Leo Flowers, Gina, and Bryan join and the group talks about hairstyles and crypto. Next, Dawson leads a special San Diego-themed round of The Rotten Tomatoes Game before Gina reports news stories. For the final part of the show, Adam invites a middle school teacher on stage to join him for a round of "Adam Carolla is Unprepared"
